functional_requirements.description: The system must allow users to register basic information of a trainee including Name, Sex, Designation, Organization Name, Mobile No, Email, NID, etc.
The system should allow the super admin user to create and manage training course details like course title, description, and duration.
The system must allow users to register basic information of a trainer including Name, Sex, Designation, Organization Name, Subject Specialization, Mobile No, Email, NID, etc.
The system should allow users to enroll trainees in courses and manage their enrollment data.
The system must provide a dashboard with summarized and ongoing status of courses and trainees.
Admin users should be able to create users for different offices (head office, district, upazilla) with assigned roles.
The system should send email notifications to trainees when nominated for training or when information is updated.
The system should allow authorized users to generate reports for trainees, trainers, attendance sheets, and other customized reports.

non_functional_requirements.description: The system must ensure access control and application-level security, including role-wise credential management.
The system must provide encryption for user IDs and passwords, with features like minimum password length and reset functionality.
The system should support periodic and instant data backups, and automatic archiving of critical data.
The platform must be responsive, cross-browser compatible, and graphically attractive.
The system must support Bengali Unicode for proper display of content in both English and Bengali languages.
The system should be tested at module integration and load levels to ensure its scalability and performance.
The system should be scalable to handle increasing user loads and data volumes.
